mapper.select: select id, applicationId, status, remarks, timestamp from application_change_history where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into application_change_history (id, applicationId, status, remarks, timestamp) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicationid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT})
